name: Pumpkin's Day
description:
PURPOSE

A little video game we create on the 2018 Hallo'UEM Jam. This game won the third prize of this Game Jam against other 15 projects. 

PLOT

In the game, we control a pumpkin that in Halloween's day that runs away from his buyers house to the farm it belongs. 

CONTROLS

  • Mouse movement - Player rotation
  • WASD - Player Movement
  • Space bar - Turn On/Off the lantern

SOURCE CODE

https://github.com/Pokoi/pumpkin-s-day
